Pull request merge from lesteve/nilearn:reorganise-examples to nilearn/nilearn:master

text: Just for completeness: I left the plot__simple_.py in the "General" section and try to put the rest of the examples in the right subfolder.

Titles:

  "Connectivity" -> "Funtional connectivit"

  "Decoding" -> "Decoding and predicting from brain images"

Also, it would be nice to have a sentence in each README, below the
title, telling us a tiny bit more, and possibly linking to relevent parts
of the documentation (cross-linking in a documentation is really very
important).
I fixed a few things and pushed to my gh-pages: http://lesteve.github.io/auto_examples/index.html

Looks absolutely great. :+1: on my side, if there are no broken links in
the documentation.
Use auto_examples in image target for consistency
Fix broken links after examples reorganisation
Add links to documentation in examples section
